original_title: 仮面ライダージュウガVS仮面ライダーオルテカ
overview: This two-episode TTFC exclusive web series takes place after the events of the Revice Forward: Kamen Rider Live & Evil & Demons film. George Karizaki/Kamen Rider Juuga visits the laboratory to hear the advice from researcher Sho Takada, who helped with the development of the Juuga Driver, and is an old friend of his father, Masumi Karizaki. Takada showed him a video of Orteca escaping from prison! Orteca later transforms into Kamen Rider Orteca!
tagline: We don't need 2 geniuses... The starring role will be me. No, it's me!
title: Kamen Raidā Jūga VS Kamen Raidā Oruteka
